comment.body:
A <tt>long</tt> value that may be updated atomically. See the {@link java.util.concurrent.atomic} package specification for description of the properties of atomic variables. An <tt>AtomicLong</tt> is used in applications such as atomically incremented sequence numbers, and cannot be used as a replacement for a {@link java.lang.Long}. However, this class does extend <tt>Number</tt> to allow uniform access by tools and utilities that deal with numerically-based classes.
@since 1.5 @author Doug Lea
